events.description: The trigger word began indicates the initiation or commencement of an event, signifying the start of a process or activity.
The trigger word concluded indicates the termination or completion of an event, marking the end of a process or activity.

85.text: all matches were played in woodlands, singapore.

11.text: after turning to the northeast, it re - intensified and made landfall on august 31 on the north carolina coast just below hurricane status.

events.description: The trigger word landfall refers to the event of a storm reaching the coast

11.text: the tour opened on 15 september 2010 in toronto, and moved through north america before ending the first leg of the tour in mexico city, 21 december 2010.

The trigger word moved indicates the progression or travel of the tour.
The trigger word ending refers to the event of the tour concluding.

11.text: the stationmaster ran towards them waving a red lamp but the drivers thought he was signalling to the shunters and did not slacken speed.

The trigger word thought refers to the event of the drivers thinking about something.
The trigger word signalling refers to the event of someone sending information or instructions by means of signals.
The trigger word slacken refers to the event of decreasing or slowing down the speed of the train.

11.text: afterwards, osea began to weaken because of increased wind shear, and the cyclone started moving southeast.

32.text: the final leg of the tour began on october 11, 2001, in el paso tx., and then various dates in texas ( including the pleasure island music festival w / the cult ), new york, san francisco, l. a, and back to houston, tx on november 21, 2001, which effectively ended the support and promotion of their ' best of ' album, ` `.

events.description: The trigger word began refers to the event of the tour commencing at a specific date and location
The trigger word festival refers to the event of a organized event often celebrating a particular theme or activity
The trigger word ended refers to the event of the support and promotion of their album coming to a conclusion

32.text: the first confrontations broke out in 1792 and developed in stages into a peasant revolt, then guerrilla warfare, and eventually to full - scale battles, ending only with their defeat by forces of the republic in 1800.

events.description: The trigger word confrontations refers to the event of an encounter between opposing sides
The trigger word revolt refers to the event of an uprising against authority
The trigger word warfare refers to the event of armed conflict between parties
The trigger word battles refers to the event of armed conflict between two or more parties
The trigger word defeat refers to the event where one side loses to another in a conflict

The trigger word deaths refers to the event of a person being dead, typically due to an accident

21.text: at least 100, 000 papuans have been killed in the violence, and thousands more have been raped, tortured and imprisoned by the indonesian military since 1969 and the indonesian governance style has been compared to that of a police state, suppressing freedom of political association and political expression.

The trigger word raped refers to the event of forcing someone to have sexual intercourse.
The trigger word tortured refers to the event of inflicting severe pain or suffering on someone.
The trigger word imprisoned refers to the event of putting someone in prison or confining them.
The trigger word suppressing refers to the event of preventing something from being seen or expressed.

The trigger word burned refers to the event of setting something on fire.

24.text: the 2011 norway attacks, referred to in norway as 22 july ( ) or as 22 / 7, were two sequential lone wolf domestic terrorist attacks by anders behring breivik against the government, the civilian population, and a workers ' youth league ( auf ) summer camp, in which 77 people were killed.

24.text: the 1920 kiev offensive ( or kiev operation ), sometimes considered to have started the unk war, was an attempt by the armed forces of the newly re - emerged poland led by unk unk, in alliance with the ukrainian leader symon petliura, to seize the territories of modern - day ukraine which fell under the soviet control after the bolshevik revolution.

events.description: The trigger word offensive refers to the event of a military attack or campaign
